Posted By: Jay
I was the winner of this lot. I wanted one card, the T211 and have the other four left. These include a T215-2 Tinker, T213-2 Doolan, T209-2 Gillespie and a T210 series 3. Anyone with interest please contact me with trade or purchase possibilities.

Thanks--Jay (oldjudge@gmail.com)
